mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of Jackson Huff
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of Jackson Huff Elizabeth Huff, Widow William Sowder, Administrator with will attached Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 240, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
